name: ColorMix (FunkyBuritto)
description:
WATCH OUT, MUST PLAY IN FULLSCREEN!

Your task is to match the given color. You can hit a color to absorb part of that color and combine your color to get to the exact given color. You only need to click on a circle to hit it.

Watchout that you don't think to long because your also on a timer, if you can't match the color within the given time frame your 'run' ends. rounds will go exponentially faster and you gain exponentially more points, so go as far as you can.

DISCLAIMER: This is not a colorblind friendly game.
